Topic.Title: Why are my threads getting deleted

Posts.EditableText:
I just noticed that this is the second one that got deleted.  Whats the deal?  I mean Im new and such but I dont think I said anything bad and such.

And I mean Jeff has told his parents about his preferences and its not like I outed him or anything especialy since nobody here knows him.

And before anybody tells me to keep this in PM, well I want to know who to PM about this.
